SpellChargeTime.Description: The time it takes to charge the spell, to then be able to activate it.

SpellActivationTime.Description: The time it takes for the spell to fully activate. This is the time between the moment the killer presses the activation button and the moment when the sphere is lauched.

Cooldown_ChargeThresholdInSeconds.Description: The threshold in seconds for the charge to reach for any cooldown to be triggered. (to prevent punishing players when tapping the ability button)

Cooldown_IntroCooldown.Description: The cooldown that is applied at the start of the match, after the intro sequence is completed

Cooldown_ActivatedSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell is cast.

Cooldown_CancelledSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell was cancelled (i.e. charge has been started but spell was not confirmed to be cast)

ExitInteractionTime_ActivatedSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cast.

ExitInteractionTime_CancelledSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cancelled (not cast).

TrajectoryPreviewer_ForwardDistanceOffse.Description: The forward offset distance the previewer will appear in front of the killer

TrajectoryPreviewer_Length.Description: The length of the previewer in cm (how far the previewer will display the path forward)

TrajectoryPreviewer_Width.Description: The width of the previewer in cm

DetectionSphere_MaximumSpeed.Description: The maximum speed (in cm/s) the detection sphere can reach

DetectionSphere_StateDuration_Active.Description: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) the detection sphere is allowed to be active for, before despawning.

DetectionSphere_StateDuration_Disappeari.Description: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) the detection sphere is allowed to be active for, before despawning.

DetectionSphere_TargetSize_Appearing.Description: The target size of the sphere when the killer is charging the Detection spell, and holding the charge.

DetectionSphere_TargetSize_Active.Description: The default target size of the detection sphere during the active state

DetectionSphere_SizeUpdateTime_Activatin.Description: The time it takes for the sphere to grow to its target size.

DetectionSphere_SizeUpdateTime_Active.Description: The time it takes for the sphere to grow to its target size.

DetectionSphere_SizeUpdateTime_Disappear.Description: The time it takes for the sphere to shrink in size and disappear

StatusEffect_KillerInstinct_LingerTime.Description: The time the killer instinct effect lingers once the survivor exits the detection zone.

StatusEffect_MagicItemDisabled_LingerTim.Description: The time the magic items are disabled once the survivor exits the detection zone.

Counter_RevealKillerDuration.Description: The time the killer is revealed to the survivor when activating the detection spell.

Addon_04_KillerInstinctAddedDuration.Description: The amount of added time (in seconds) added to the killer instinct linger effect once a survivor is detected and leaves the detection area.

Addon_08_DetectionSphereSizeModifierAddi.Description: The modifier that is added to the default radius value of the detection sphere

Addon_08_DetectionSphereMaximumSpeedModi.Description: The modifier that is multiplied to the maximum speed of the detectoin sphere

Addon_13_ExhaustionEffectLifetime.Description: The duration (in seconds) of the exhaustion effect once it is applied onto the survivor detected by the sphere.

Addon_19_ScreamRevealDuration.Description: The duration the survivor screaming is revealed to the killer player.

Addon_19_BrokenEffectLifetime.Description: The amount of time (in seconds) the broken status effect will be applied to the survivor.
